edu.flash3388.flashlib.robot.hid

Class XboxController

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.flash3388.flashlib.communications.Sendable
      • edu.flash3388.flashlib.flashboard.HIDSendable
        • edu.flash3388.flashlib.robot.hid.XboxController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    HID, ScheduledTask

    public class XboxController
extends HIDSendable
implements HID, ScheduledTask
    Represents an Xbox 360 controller for use in FRC robot code This is a wrapper class for an Xbox 360 controller
